name: Traffic Troubles (SodiumNickel)
description:
(If inputs aren't working reload page and click on screen)

A game made for the Kenney Jam 2022 with the theme of growth. I was super busy this weekend, but wanted to try out the jam and fit in a couple late nights to make a quick puzzle game about a growing line of traffic.

Eat all the food and reach the oil to win!

Kenney Assets Used

Input Prompts Pixel 16

City Kit Commercial

Survival Kit

Platformer Kit

Food Kit

Car Kit

Kenney Fonts

Sound Effects Used

Car Honk

Fall Sound

Food Munch

Win Sound

Wind Sound

Campfire Crackle
